cards.flavor: "In your misguided attempt to subvert the law, you have eloquently explained why the law must exist."
cards.name: Absorb
cards.text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.
cards.name: Act of Treason
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"The absence of binocular vision imposes certain challenges for a flying creature, which are overcome via echolocation."
—Simic research notes
cards.name: Aeromunculus
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Amplifire
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Until your next turn, Amplifire's base power becomes twice that card's power and its base toughness becomes twice that card's toughness. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor:
"If we cannot have peace, we will have justice."
—Aurelia
cards.name: Angelic Exaltation
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

cards.name: Angel of Grace
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Angel of Grace enters the battlefield, until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
{4}{W}{W}, Exile Angel of Grace from your graveyard: Your life total becomes 10.

cards.name: Applied Biomancy
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: A ray of hope breaks through the shroud of rain.
cards.name: Archway Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Archway Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each Gate you control.

cards.flavor: Law is the voice of reason.
cards.name: Arrester's Admonition
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Law is the light of civilization.
cards.name: Arrester's Zeal
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: In preparation for the conflict all foresaw, the Golgari called upon an army that had slept for millennia beneath the city.
cards.name: Awaken the Erstwhile
cards.text: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

cards.flavor:
"Imagine a gigantic pine cone that's extremely territorial and always in a foul mood."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster
cards.name: Axebane Beast

cards.flavor:
"If the populace fears our authority, then I'd say we have an appropriately sensible populace."
—Dovin Baan
cards.name: Azorius Guildgate
cards.text:
Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

cards.flavor: Thanks to the magic of his Writ of Passage, alms beasts lumbered aside, anarchs bowed their heads, and even Rakdos acrobats rolled their spikewheels out of his way.
cards.name: Azorius Knight-Arbiter
cards.text:
Vigilance
Azorius Knight-Arbiter can't be blocked.

cards.flavor:
"Mandatory lockets enable the tracking of all Senate personnel for improved security and efficiency."
—Dovin Baan
cards.name: Azorius Locket
cards.text:
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{W/U}{W/U}{W/U}{W/U}, {T}, Sacrifice Azorius Locket: Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: "These new thopters are all well and good, but four eyes are better than none."
cards.name: Azorius Skyguard
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

cards.flavor: "Your spirits can rest in peace, for your debts are paid."
cards.name: Bankrupt in Blood
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures.
Draw three cards.

cards.flavor: You can hear their tolling only when your debt is due.
cards.name: Basilica Bell-Haunt
cards.text: When Basilica Bell-Haunt enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Bedeck
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Bedazzle
cards.text: Destroy target nonbasic land. Bedazzle deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor:
"It's easy to get taken in by the spectacle, to enjoy a bit of naughty amusement. But make no mistake: the Cult of Rakdos is a danger."
—Tajic
cards.name: Bedevil
cards.text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "I am my life's work."
cards.name: Benthic Biomancer
cards.text:
{1}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Benthic Biomancer, draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.name: Biogenic Ooze
cards.text:
When Biogenic Ooze enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each Ooze you control.
{1}{G}{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.

cards.flavor:
"To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means."
—Vannifar
cards.name: Biogenic Upgrade
cards.text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.

cards.name: Biomancer's Familiar
cards.text:
Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.
{T}: The next time target creature adapts this turn, it adapts as though it had no +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.flavor:
"The pain of searing iron and razor edges pales beside the pleasure of performance."
—Judith
cards.name: Bladebrand
cards.text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Blade Juggler
cards.text:
Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

cards.flavor: Life is a show, and death its final performance.
cards.name: Blood Crypt
cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: Blood seeks blood, and nothing shall hold back its hunger.
cards.name: Bloodmist Infiltrator
cards.text: Whenever Bloodmist Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bloodmist Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: Jaharg discovered that the shapes and symmetries so pleasing to the sculptor's eye also yielded a well-balanced bludgeon.
cards.name: Bolrac-Clan Crusher
cards.text: {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Bolrac-Clan Crusher deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
"One beginning, many paths."
—Vannifar
cards.name: Breeding Pool
cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: "In you go, big guy. Watch your head."
cards.name: Bring to Trial
cards.text: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.flavor:
"From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
cards.name: Burn Bright
cards.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The ostentatious splendor of the Orzhov church was just asking to be smashed.
cards.name: Burning-Tree Vandal
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Captive Audience
cards.text:
Captive Audience enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen -
• Your life total becomes 4.
• Discard your hand.
• Each opponent creates five 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

cards.name: Carnival
cards.text: Carnival deals 1 damage to target creature or planeswalker and 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

cards.name: Carnage
cards.text: Carnage deals 3 damage to target opponent. That player discards two cards.

cards.flavor: No scrap of nutrition goes to waste in the undercity.
cards.name: Carrion Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Carrion Imp enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel."
"No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me."
Then Croc came and ate them both.
cards.name: Catacomb Crocodile

cards.flavor: Let the Dimir worry about witnesses. For the Rakdos, screams count as applause.
cards.name: Cavalcade of Calamity
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Cavalcade of Calamity deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

cards.name: Charging War Boar
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
As long as you control a Domri planeswalker, Charging War Boar gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.flavor: If you can see your breath, it's too late to run.
cards.name: Chillbringer
cards.text:
Flying
When Chillbringer enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Cindervines
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, Cindervines deals 1 damage to that player.
{1}, Sacrifice Cindervines: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cindervines deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

cards.flavor: "These are your streets. Defend them! This is your neighborhood. Honor it! This is your city. Save it!"
cards.name: Civic Stalwart
cards.text: When Civic Stalwart enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Little goblin. Big noise."
—Ruric Thar
cards.name: Clamor Shaman
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Clamor Shaman attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

cards.name: Clan Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{2}{G}, {T}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

cards.flavor:
"The best way to keep a secret is to forget it."
—Lazav
cards.name: Clear the Mind
cards.text:
Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "Make way! It's time for the final act!"
cards.name: Clear the Stage
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Code of Constraint
cards.text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Collision
cards.text: Collision deals 6 damage to target creature with flying.

cards.name: Colossus
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Combine Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{G}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto another target creature you control.

cards.flavor:
"What makes a frog lizard any worse than a bird horse? Prejudice against the Simic, that's what! It's unfair!"
—Thados Arquef,
Guardian Project biomancer
cards.name: Concordia Pegasus
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Consecrate
cards.text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Consume
cards.text: Target player sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to its power.

cards.flavor: First your whole life flashes before your eyes. Then you have considerable time to reflect on every regret as you plummet.
cards.name: Consign to the Pit
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.flavor: Few Ravnicans are aware of the vast reefs in their world's hidden ocean. Far beneath the great sinkholes, where the light is blue and dim, merfolk tend the coral labyrinths that feed the benthic ecosystem.
cards.name: Coral Commando

cards.flavor: If your ears bleed, it's a party. If your eyes bleed, it's a Rakdos party.
cards.name: Cry of the Carnarium
cards.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.name: Cult Guildmage
cards.text:
{3}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
{R}, {T}: Cult Guildmage deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "Keep coming. I have knives enough for everyone."
cards.name: Dagger Caster
cards.text: When Dagger Caster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

cards.flavor: You're only as dead as you feel.
cards.name: Dead Revels
cards.text:
Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: By design, the sarcophagus muffles the debtors' moans but does not silence them.
cards.name: Debtors' Transport
cards.text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

cards.flavor:
"Leave no stone unturned."
—Ruric Thar
cards.name: Deface
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature with defender.

cards.name: Depose
cards.text:
Tap target creature.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Deploy
cards.text: Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

cards.name: Deputy of Detention
cards.text: When Deputy of Detention enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls and all other nonland permanents that player controls with the same name as that permanent until Deputy of Detention leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Domri, Chaos Bringer
cards.text:
+1: Add {R} or {G}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains riot. (It enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
-3: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
-8: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of each end step, create a 4/4 red and green Beast creature token with trample."

cards.name: Domri, City Smasher
cards.text:
+2: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
-3: Domri, City Smasher deals 3 damage to any target.
-8: Put three +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Those creatures gain trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Good girl."
cards.name: Domri's Nodorog
cards.text:
Trample
When Domri's Nodorog enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Domri, City Smasher, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.name: Dovin, Architect of Law
cards.text:
+1: You gain 2 life and draw a card.
-1: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
-9: Tap all permanents target opponent controls. That player skips their next untap step.

cards.name: Dovin, Grand Arbiter
cards.text:
+1: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a loyalty counter on Dovin, Grand Arbiter.
-1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life.
-7: Look at the top ten cards of your library. Put three of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor: Dovin ticked the Planeswalkers off on his fingers: himself, Domri, Kaya, Ral, Vraska . . . and Bolas made an even six.
cards.name: Dovin's Acuity
cards.text:
When Dovin's Acuity enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
Whenever you cast an instant spell during your main phase, you may return Dovin's Acuity to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: It was made for battle, but that doesn't mean it's unsophisticated.
cards.name: Dovin's Automaton
cards.text: As long as you control a Dovin planeswalker, Dovin's Automaton gets +2/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

cards.flavor: "We're finished here."
cards.name: Dovin's Dismissal
cards.text: Put up to one target tapped creature on top of its owner's library. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Dovin, Architect of Law, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.flavor: Never boring.
cards.name: Drill Bit
cards.text:
Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor: "Basically, we turn a bunch of little lightnings into one big lightning."
cards.name: Electrodominance
cards.text: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a card with converted mana cost X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: "Hold it! I need to see your papers."
cards.name: Elite Arrester
cards.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.name: Emergency Powers
cards.text:
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Emergency Powers.
Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may put a permanent card with converted mana cost 7 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"Smash this city to pieces."
—Domri Rade
cards.name: End-Raze Forerunners
cards.text:
Vigilance, trample, haste
When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "There's no time to calm it down! Run!"
cards.name: Enraged Ceratok
cards.text: Enraged Ceratok can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

cards.flavor:
"It's not enough to defeat our foes. We must learn from them, too."
—Vannifar
cards.name: Essence Capture
cards.text: Counter target creature spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

cards.flavor:
"Time to let the dead be dead."
—Kaya, to Teysa
cards.name: Ethereal Absolution
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
{2}{W}{B}: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, you create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.flavor:
"Lies cannot long withstand the harsh light of day."
—Lavinia
cards.name: Expose to Daylight
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.

cards.flavor: "They've got eyes inside my head!"
cards.name: Eyes Everywhere
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
{5}{U}: Exchange control of Eyes Everywhere and target nonland permanent. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.flavor: Faeries are easily offended and quick to exact a quirky revenge.
cards.name: Faerie Duelist
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Faerie Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Lost are the lush meadows and verdant forests, where maaka prowled and lammasu soared. Lost are the wilds, where our hearts were free."
—Daiva, Gruul storyteller
cards.name: Feral Maaka

cards.flavor: There's nothing quite like the feeling of paying off a large debt.
cards.name: Final Payment
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 5 life or sacrifice a creature or enchantment.
Destroy target creature.

cards.flavor: "Let's find out what kind of audience you are. Festive? Fearless?"
cards.name: Fireblade Artist
cards.text:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, Fireblade Artist deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "Fire will cure a multitude of ills."
cards.name: Flames of the Raze-Boar
cards.text: Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Then Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 2 damage to each other creature that player controls if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.flavor:
"No worthwhile reward is easily gained."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Font of Agonies
cards.text:
Whenever you pay life, put that many blood counters on Font of Agonies.
{1}{B}, Remove four blood counters from Font of Agonies: Destroy target creature.

cards.flavor:
"This footlight's broken. Get me a stagehand!"
—Judith
cards.name: Footlight Fiend
cards.text: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: "You will respect the dead."
cards.name: Forbidding Spirit
cards.text: When Forbidding Spirit enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures.

cards.name: Frenzied Arynx
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Trample
{4}{R}{G}: Frenzied Arynx gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Your arrival was expected...and unwelcome."
cards.name: Frilled Mystic
cards.text:
Flash
When Frilled Mystic enters the battlefield, you may counter target spell.

cards.flavor:
"I might have overfed him."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer
cards.name: Galloping Lizrog
cards.text:
Trample
When Galloping Lizrog enters the battlefield, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control. If you do, put twice that many +1/+1 counters on Galloping Lizrog.

cards.flavor: So-called "battering rams" pale in comparison to the real thing.
cards.name: Gatebreaker Ram
cards.text:
Gatebreaker Ram gets +1/+1 for each Gate you control.
As long as you control two or more Gates, Gatebreaker Ram has vigilance and trample.

cards.name: Gate Colossus
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Gate you control.
Gate Colossus can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, you may put Gate Colossus from your graveyard on top of your library.

cards.flavor: When the Izzet's spirit of invention extends to the city's infrastructure, the results are sometimes explosive.
cards.name: Gates Ablaze
cards.text: Gates Ablaze deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of Gates you control.

cards.flavor: The Chamber of the Guildpact has fallen silent, its bright promise broken.
cards.name: Gateway Plaza
cards.text:
Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: "I've been through every guild gate in this city, and no one sees me come or go."
cards.name: Gateway Sneak
cards.text:
Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, Gateway Sneak can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Gateway Sneak deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Vraska sees the grandeur in death but misses the hilarity."
—Judith
cards.name: Get the Point
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Scry 1.

cards.flavor: "Today the Rubblebelt is a bit larger. That's a good day's work."
cards.name: Ghor-Clan Wrecker
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.flavor:
"When the sky screams, when the ground groans, the End-Raze will soon begin."
—Nikya of the Old Ways
cards.name: Gift of Strength
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Counterbalanced forces sustain this city. No faction above others. A beautiful idea."
—Emmara
cards.name: Glass of the Guildpact
cards.text: Multicolored creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor: Two's a party. Three's a felony.
cards.name: Goblin Gathering
cards.text: Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to two plus the number of cards named Goblin Gathering in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Sin is debt, and absolution is paid in tithes of gold and blood.
cards.name: Godless Shrine
cards.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: "Debt due! Debt due!" The thrull's screeching makes children flinch and debtors quail. "Debt due!"
cards.name: Grasping Thrull
cards.text:
Flying
When Grasping Thrull enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"No peace accord will save Ravnica. You don't build on rot. You burn it down and start again."
—Domri Rade
cards.name: Gravel-Hide Goblin
cards.text: {3}{G}: Gravel-Hide Goblin gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"A debtor's soul has little value, except as a warning to others who might consider defaulting on their loans."
—Ubea, Orzhov ministrant
cards.name: Grotesque Demise
cards.text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

cards.name: Growth-Chamber Guardian
cards.text:
{2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Growth-Chamber Guardian, you may search your library for a card named Growth-Chamber Guardian, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Cyclical and spiral patterns are the specialty of the Gyre Clade, which seeks to revitalize the cycles of nature.
cards.name: Growth Spiral
cards.text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Gruul Beastmaster
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Gruul Beastmaster attacks, another target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Gruul Beastmaster's power.

cards.flavor:
"Beyond this gate there are no citizens, only predators and prey."
—Domri Rade
cards.name: Gruul Guildgate
cards.text:
Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

cards.flavor:
"In life, it was a cunning survivor, fearless and quick. May its power pass to you as you wear its skull."
—Gna, Gruul shaman
cards.name: Gruul Locket
cards.text:
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{R/G}{R/G}{R/G}{R/G}, {T}, Sacrifice Gruul Locket: Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: She displays her scars with pride.
cards.name: Gruul Spellbreaker
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Trample
As long as it's your turn, you and Gruul Spellbreaker have hexproof.

cards.flavor: Simic's strength comes from its diversity.
cards.name: Guardian Project
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn't have the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Down here, things don't stay dead."
—Lavinia
cards.name: Gutterbones
cards.text:
Gutterbones enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Gutterbones from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn and only if an opponent lost life this turn.

cards.flavor: "As I contemplate what is, I dive ever deeper into the depths of possibility. Then I set an experiment in motion and watch the truth rise to the surface."
cards.name: Gyre Engineer
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}{U}.

cards.flavor: "You two, cover the alley! You, with me! Eyes on windows, balconies, and rooftops. Who knows what a fish-octopus-crab can do!"
cards.name: Haazda Officer
cards.text: When Haazda Officer enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "They all want to see me fall."
cards.name: Hackrobat
cards.text:
Spectacle {B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
{B}: Hackrobat gains deathtouch until end of turn.
{R}: Hackrobat gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The ever-watchful center of a growing web of eyes.
cards.name: Hallowed Fountain
cards.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: When the established order falters, what remains are ordinary people and their struggle to survive.
cards.name: Hero of Precinct One
cards.text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

cards.name: High Alert
cards.text:
Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
Creatures you control can attack as though they didn't have defender.
{2}{W}{U}: Untap target creature.

cards.flavor: Searching the city for Fblthp felt like sifting the rain for a single drop of blood.
cards.name: Humongulus
cards.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.flavor: Havoc is a small price to pay for data.
cards.name: Hydroid Krasis
cards.text:
When you cast this spell, you gain half X life and draw half X cards. Round down each time.
Flying, trample
Hydroid Krasis enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.flavor: "The suffering of others is not my concern."
cards.name: Ill-Gotten Inheritance
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: "Hello, kindling."
cards.name: Immolation Shaman
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent activates an ability of an artifact, creature, or land that isn't a mana ability, Immolation Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.
{3}{R}{R}: Immolation Shaman gets +3/+3 and gains menace until end of turn.

cards.flavor: In times of unrest, the crowd is eager for the comfort of strong convictions.
cards.name: Impassioned Orator
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: The rights of ghosts are strictly protected under Orzhov bylaws, and those who enforce them can count on the ghosts' assistance.
cards.name: Imperious Oligarch
cards.text:
Vigilance
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

cards.name: Incubation Druid
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce. If Incubation Druid has a +1/+1 counter on it, add three mana of that type instead.
{3}{G}{G}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

cards.name: Incubation
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Incongruity
cards.text: Exile target creature. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

cards.flavor: At the end of the show, she stands alone on a stage brilliant with blood.
cards.name: Judith, the Scourge Diva
cards.text:
Other creatures you control get +1/+0.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Judith, the Scourge Diva deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
"Hey, wait! That's my boot!"
—Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian
cards.name: Junktroller
cards.text:
Defender
{T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.flavor: With the new guildmaster's innovations, arresters can arrive on the scene moments before a crime is committed.
cards.name: Justiciar's Portal
cards.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. It gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper
cards.text:
+1: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life if at least one creature card was exiled this way.
-1: Exile target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 1 or less.
-5: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards that player owns in exile and you gain that much life.

cards.flavor: Teysa convened the meeting of the Obzedat. Kaya ended it.
cards.name: Kaya's Wrath
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. You gain life equal to the number of creatures you controlled that were destroyed this way.

cards.flavor: The helmet reveals no eyes to witness your penance, no mouth to offer absolution.
cards.name: Knight of Sorrows
cards.text:
Knight of Sorrows can block an additional creature each combat.
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

cards.name: Knight of the Last Breath
cards.text:
{3}, Sacrifice another nontoken creature: Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
Afterlife 3 (When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

cards.flavor: "I told Jace that Ravnica would fall apart if he didn't take his responsibilities seriously. I didn't want to be right."
cards.name: Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
cards.text:
Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with converted mana cost greater than the number of lands that player controls.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

cards.name: Lawmage's Binding
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

cards.flavor:
"Places, everyone!"
—Judith

cards.text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

cards.text:
Vigilance
When Lumbering Battlement enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nontoken creatures you control until it leaves the battlefield.
Lumbering Battlement gets +2/+2 for each card exiled with it.

cards.flavor: The Rakdos put the "fun" in "funeral."

cards.text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor:
"The good news is that the migrating drakes are no longer a problem."
—Bell Migellic, Azorius hussar

cards.text: Reach

cards.flavor: Those who cross the Dimir find enemies everywhere they turn.

cards.text: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

cards.text:

Mesmerizing Benthid has hexproof as long as you control an Illusion.

cards.flavor: When the price of your sins comes due, the Church of Deals is there to collect.

cards.text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

cards.name: Mirror March
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, flip a coin until you lose a flip. For each flip you won, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor:
"Your debt is erased."
—Hilgur, Orzhov euthanist

cards.flavor: "The hooves of the Raze-Bore will trample the weak—and their city—to dust!"

You can't cast noncreature spells.

cards.flavor: Its stench corrodes steel. Its miasma sickens angels. Its finality ends hope.

cards.text:
Menace, deathtouch
Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor: "Pay in gold. Pay in blood. Pay with the servitude of your spirit kin. But pay you must."

cards.flavor: "Entertain me."

Flying, trample
When Rakdos, the Showstopper enters the battlefield, flip a coin for each creature that isn't a Demon, Devil, or Imp. Destroy each creature whose coin comes up tails.

cards.flavor:
"The louder their performance, the quieter we become in comparison. They are the perfect distractions, for only fools ignore the Rakdos."
—Lazav
cards.name: Rakdos Trumpeter
cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{3}{R}: Rakdos Trumpeter gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The guildmasters loom large in the political sphere, but in the end, the rulers of Ravnica are its people.
cards.name: Rally to Battle
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap them.

cards.flavor: "Rage! Rage until the whole world burns!"

cards.flavor:
"When you get right down to it, the difference between death and life is just a membrane-enclosed environment maintained by a metabolic process."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

cards.name: Repudiate
cards.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

cards.name: Replicate

cards.flavor: A friend in good times, a guardian in bad times, and a savior when all else fails.

Defender
{1}, Sacrifice Resolute Watchdog: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

cards.text: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Revenge
cards.text: Double your life total. Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

cards.flavor: Some view Domri's unlikely ascent as a sign of Ilharg the Raze-Boar's imminent return.
cards.name: Rhythm of the Wild
cards.text:
Creature spells you control can't be countered.
Nontoken creatures you control have riot. (They enter the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

Spectacle {2}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Rix Maadi Reveler enters the battlefield, discard a card, then draw a card. If Rix Maadi Reveler's spectacle cost was paid, instead discard your hand, then draw three cards.

cards.flavor: The roots run deep under stone and street, with strength that needs but a whisper to awaken.

cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

cards.flavor: Joining a guild, even the Gruul, would mean giving up some of his independence. He'd rather smash what he wants to smash.
cards.name: Rubblebelt Recluse
cards.text: Rubblebelt Recluse attacks each combat if able.

cards.flavor: The sly, stealthy warriors of the Slizt Clan survive by hiding in high ground and ambushing their enemies. Other Gruul call them skulkers and cowards, but only from a safe distance.
cards.name: Rubblebelt Runner
cards.text: Rubblebelt Runner can't be blocked by creature tokens.

cards.flavor: Gruul oracles see omens in all forms of destruction: the entrails of maaka's prey, the flight of vultures over a battlefield, the scattering of toppled stone.

cards.text: Destroy target land. Scry 2.

cards.flavor:
"Tear down the city, lie by lie. Then throw it back at the liars, stone by stone."
—Domri Rade

cards.flavor: The Rubblebelt grows restless.

cards.flavor: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.

cards.flavor:
"My bowstring hums in tune with the song of the Worldsoul."
—Alcarus, Selesnya sagittar

cards.flavor: Feel it steel. Feed it gold. Feed it bone. In the belly of the furnace, the flames know no difference.

cards.name: Spawn of Mayhem
cards.text:
Spectacle {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, Spawn of Mayhem deals 1 damage to each player. Then if you have 10 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on Spawn of Mayhem.

cards.flavor:
"Don't waste time aiming, you lazy gob-slug! Fire!"
—Krenko, mob boss
cards.name: Spear Spewer
cards.text:
Defender
{T}: Spear Spewer deals 1 damage to each player.

cards.flavor: "I do not understand the future I see: the guilds subverted, the world at war, armies bent to a cruel conqueror's will."
cards.name: Sphinx of Foresight
cards.text:
You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, scry 3 at the beginning of your first upkeep.
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.

cards.flavor: Azorius sphinxes are loyal to the precepts of the law, not to any particular guildmaster—even one of their own kind.
cards.name: Sphinx of New Prahv
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Spells your opponents cast that target Sphinx of New Prahv cost {2} more to cast.

cards.name: Sphinx of the Guildpact
cards.text:
Sphinx of the Guildpact is all colors.
Flying
Hexproof from monocolored (This creature can't be the target of monocolored spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.flavor: "Do not think me blind to your true mission...or your true master, Grand Arbiter."
cards.name: Sphinx's Insight
cards.text:
Draw two cards.
Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: "Every street's a stage, and every screaming bystander's an audience."
cards.name: Spikewheel Acrobat
cards.text: Spectacle {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)

cards.flavor: Its mandibles can leave a rider in the clouds astride a headless griffin.
cards.name: Spire Mangler
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Spire Mangler enters the battlefield, target creature with flying you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: She breathes fair winds to tired griffins and lifts songbirds beyond the reach of stalking cats.
cards.name: Spirit of the Spires
cards.text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +0/+1.

cards.flavor:
"If the Fin Clade cannot produce a reliable venomous krasis, mobile in both air and water, then the Guardian Project will absorb its resources."
—Vannifar
cards.name: Steeple Creeper
cards.text: {3}{U}: Steeple Creeper gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"What we begin, the End-Raze will finish. Then we will dance in Ravnica's rubble."
—Nikya of the Old Ways
cards.name: Stomping Ground
cards.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: "What you build, we will destroy . . . and bury you in the rubble!"
cards.name: Stony Strength
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Untap that creature.

cards.flavor: "My shout is thunder and my fist is lightning!"
cards.name: Storm Strike
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.

cards.flavor: Any challenge to Azorius authority is met with swift and potent retribution.
cards.name: Summary Judgment
cards.text:
Summary Judgment deals 3 damage to target tapped creature.
Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, it deals 5 damage to that creature instead.

cards.flavor: "You take our wilds, we take your city."
cards.name: Sunder Shaman
cards.text:
Sunder Shaman can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Whenever Sunder Shaman deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

cards.flavor:
"Oops!"
—Grupgrup, sluiceway technician
cards.name: Swirling Torrent
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The mournful lowing of brushstriders warns of changing weather and ill winds.
cards.name: Sylvan Brushstrider
cards.text: When Sylvan Brushstrider enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Syndicate Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power 4 or greater.
{4}{B}, {T}: Syndicate Guildmage deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor:
"Many wings haunt the skies these days. Few of them bear good tidings."
—Lavinia
cards.name: Syndicate Messenger
cards.text:
Flying
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

cards.flavor: "I keep reminding myself we do this because others can't, because we love this city. If we don't save it, no one will."
cards.name: Tenth District Veteran
cards.text:
Vigilance
Whenever Tenth District Veteran attacks, untap another target creature you control.

cards.flavor:
"The presence of the strong will make you stronger."
—Yeva, Nature's Herald
cards.name: Territorial Boar
cards.text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Boar gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

cards.flavor: While Kaya is guildmaster, Teysa waits patiently at the center of the Orzhov web of power.
cards.name: Teysa Karlov
cards.text:
If a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
Creature tokens you control have vigilance and lifelink.

cards.name: Theater of Horrors
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library.
During your turn, if an opponent lost life this turn, you may play cards exiled with Theater of Horrors.
{3}{R}: Theater of Horrors deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: It drains vitality from those it touches.
cards.name: The Haunt of Hightower
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever The Haunt of Hightower attacks, defending player discards a card.
Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on The Haunt of Hightower.

cards.flavor:
"Your life is a blinding light, your breath a gale, your pulse a deafening drum. Be still. Be still."
—Dahlya Trul, "Irbitov Lament"
cards.name: Thirsting Shade
cards.text:
Lifelink
{2}{B}: Thirsting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"I can think of no greater punishment than answering your question in full."
—Lazav
cards.name: Thought Collapse
cards.text: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.name: Thrash
cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

cards.name: Threat
cards.text: Create a 4/4 red and green Beast creature token with trample.

cards.flavor: "That giant didn't even see me, let alone catch me! And I was close enough to smell him! Of course, that's not saying much."
cards.name: Tin Street Dodger
cards.text:
Haste
{R}: Tin Street Dodger can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with defender.

cards.flavor: Whoever wins, the neighborhood loses.
cards.name: Titanic Brawl
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.name: Tithe Taker
cards.text:
During your turn, spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast and abilities your opponents activate cost {1} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

cards.flavor:
"Reading it has given me a glimpse of what makes this deeply flawed city so very magnificent."
—Dovin Baan
cards.name: Tome of the Guildpact
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor:
"We've been practicing for this all our lives. This is the final test!"
—Korun Nar, Rubblebelt hunter
cards.name: Tower Defense
cards.text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.

cards.flavor: His favorite food is kraul.
cards.name: Trollbred Guardian
cards.text:
{2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

cards.flavor: A pet that can hunt both flesh and spirit is precious in a place where smiling assassins keep company with ghostly shadows.
cards.name: Twilight Panther
cards.text: {B}: Twilight Panther gains deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.name: Unbreakable Formation
cards.text:
Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"We grow strong by feasting on failure."
—Izoni
cards.name: Undercity Scavenger
cards.text: When Undercity Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Undercity Scavenger, then scry 2.

cards.flavor: The undercity is always hungry.
cards.name: Undercity's Embrace
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor:
"Here, there is only truth."
—Barvisa, Azorius emissary
cards.name: Verity Circle
cards.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card.
{4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

cards.flavor: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds form spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.
cards.name: Vindictive Vampire
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, Vindictive Vampire deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Orzhov vampires look for allies in unlikely places in case their new guildmaster turns on them. The fate of the Obzedat is proof of Kaya's power and her hatred of the living dead.
cards.name: Vizkopa Vampire
cards.text: Lifelink

cards.flavor: Those who intrude upon the Dimir seldom remember that they have done so.
cards.name: Wall of Lost Thoughts
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Lost Thoughts enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.name: Warrant
cards.text: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Warden
cards.text: Create a 4/4 white and blue Sphinx creature token with flying and vigilance.

cards.flavor: Loitering is not only illegal but unwise, since those who stay too long in one place are apt to be stepped on.
cards.name: Watchful Giant
cards.text: When Watchful Giant enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

cards.flavor:
"Walls crack. Buildings fall. Always the wilds return."
—Domri Rade
cards.name: Wilderness Reclamation
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, untap all lands you control.

cards.flavor: Drakes become especially voracious as they prepare for their autumn migration, hunting the city's thoroughfares from dawn to dusk.
cards.name: Windstorm Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.

cards.flavor:
"The best construction makes the most satisfying destruction."
—Domri Rade
cards.name: Wrecking Beast
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Trample

cards.name: Zegana, Utopian Speaker
cards.text:
When Zegana, Utopian Speaker enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.
{4}{G}{U}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

cards.flavor: Among the Zhur-Taa Clan, goblins are the first to enter battlefury. When the battle is over, the survivors are still frothing at the mouth, looking for someone to hit.
cards.name: Zhur-Taa Goblin
cards.text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
